# <a name="change-the-look-of-your-mailbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="0854f-102">變更您的信箱的外觀</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0854f-102">Change the look of your mailbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0854f-103">您可以變更訊息清單和讀取窗格的外觀，使它的外觀與呈現您想要的方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0854f-103">You can change the appearance of the message list and reading pane so it looks and behaves the way you want.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0854f-104">如果新的郵件應於出現的頂端或底部的郵件] 清單中，等等，選擇 [個別或以交談主旨、 是否應該顯示您的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0854f-104">Choose whether your messages should be displayed individually or as conversations, if new messages should appear at the top or bottom of the message list, and more.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0854f-105">選取齒輪圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0854f-105">Select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="0854f-106">若要開啟 [設定] 窗格的頁面頂端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0854f-106">at the top of the page to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0854f-107">選擇 [焦點收件匣的設定，則顯示密度]、 [交談] 檢視中及 [讀取窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0854f-107">Choose your settings for Focused Inbox, display density, conversation view, and reading pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0854f-108">在郵件清單的頂端，選取 [**篩選器** > **排序方式**]，以選擇您要排序您的電子郵件的方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0854f-108">At the top of the message list, select **Filter** > **Sort by** to choose how you want to sort your email.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0854f-109">若要深入了解，請參閱[變更您的信箱的外觀](https://support.office.com/article/b41c2ecb-f23c-42b3-b7f8-659646d5e58c)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0854f-109">To learn more, see [Change the look of your mailbox](https://support.office.com/article/b41c2ecb-f23c-42b3-b7f8-659646d5e58c).</span></span>
